typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		VCC as string,
		CampaignId as string,
		ContactId as string,
		ContactName as string,
		ContactAddress as string,
		InteractionId as string,
		Section as string,
		WorkitemType as string,
		TipoDeLlamada as string,
		OutboundProcessId as string,
		BatchId as string,
		Agent as string,
		ManagementResultCode as string,
		ManagementResultDescription as string,
		TmStmp as string,
		Duracion as string,
		Facturables as string,
		Carga as string,
		{Fecha de Planificación} as string,
		WaitTime as string,
		WrapUpTime as string,
		FECHA_CARGA as string,
		USUARIO_CARGA as string,
		FechaFichero as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceDMG
sourceDMG split(!isNull(Agent),
	isNull(Agent),
	disjoint: false) ~> Divisioncondicional1@(Agent, NULLAgent)
Divisioncondicional1@Agent sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		VCC as string,
		CampaignId as string,
		ContactId as string,
		ContactName as string,
		ContactAddress as string,
		InteractionId as string,
		Section as string,
		WorkitemType as string,
		TipoDeLlamada as string,
		OutboundProcessId as string,
		BatchId as string,
		Agent as string,
		ManagementResultCode as string,
		ManagementResultDescription as string,
		TmStmp as string,
		Duracion as string,
		Facturables as string,
		Carga as string,
		{Fecha de Planificación} as string,
		WaitTime as string,
		WrapUpTime as string,
		FECHA_CARGA as string,
		USUARIO_CARGA as string,
		FechaFichero as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkDMGSUPERVISION
Divisioncondicional1@NULLAgent sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		VCC as string,
		CampaignId as string,
		ContactId as string,
		ContactName as string,
		ContactAddress as string,
		InteractionId as string,
		Section as string,
		WorkitemType as string,
		TipoDeLlamada as string,
		OutboundProcessId as string,
		BatchId as string,
		Agent as string,
		ManagementResultCode as string,
		ManagementResultDescription as string,
		TmStmp as string,
		Duracion as string,
		Facturables as string,
		Carga as string,
		{Fecha de Planificación} as string,
		WaitTime as string,
		WrapUpTime as string,
		FECHA_CARGA as string,
		USUARIO_CARGA as string,
		FechaFichero as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkDMGPLANIFICACION
